The original video clip was published on: 2021, along with a Hindi-language text that claims Kejriwal supported the farm laws.
Arvind Kejriwal is identified as the chi: 3. In the video, Kejriwal appears to make remarks in Hindi that initially seem to support the farm laws, stating that it will be a revolution in the agricultural sector.
A longer video of Kejriwal: s comments from the same interview reveals that he was actually criticizing the new farming laws and advocating for their repeal, along with the introduction of a law guaranteeing Minimum Support Price (MSP).
